summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York daily activity report for July 23, 2019. It documents operational issues, staff shortages, and notably records that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch. The report provides a snapshot of facility conditions shortly before Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate 176318-054 who was placed on suicide watch on July 23, 2019, as documented in the MCC daily activity report.

events.title: Epstein placed on suicide watch
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (176318-054) was placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
Local Hospice (mentioned in context of an inmate with USMS guards)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch at MCC New York on July 23, 2019.
The MCC was experiencing operational issues including inoperative control panels for doors and gates, and ongoing fire watch details.
The facility reported staff shortages affecting correctional assignments on 10-South and in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
The document provides institutional population totals (776 inmates) at the beginning of the morning watch shift on July 23, 2019.
This administrative report creates a timeline of Epstein's status and facility conditions shortly before his death.
